title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements for the OffshoreWindFarmPlanner software.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations for maintainability, scalability, performance, security, and accessibility (user-friendly interface). Review and incorporate feedback from cross-functional team members as needed. Prepare a technical design document detailing the proposed architecture.

title: Environmental Data Integration
description: Identify and integrate relevant environmental data sources (e.g., wind patterns, ocean currents, weather conditions) for wind farm planning.

title: Wind Farm Layout Optimization Algorithm
description: Develop an AI-powered algorithm for optimal wind turbine placement and layout based on environmental factors and energy production efficiency.

title: User Interface Design - Refined
description: Design an intuitive and user-friendly interface for wind farm planning and visualization with a focus on efficiency, scalability, and seamless integration with the system architecture. Prioritize accessibility and cross-platform compatibility, ensuring compliance with best practices. Provide clear documentation and consider incorporating interactive tutorials for easy onboarding of new users.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a database schema to store environmental data, wind farm layouts, and related information.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to protect sensitive data and ensure proper authorization.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and plan for the OffshoreWindFarmPlanner software, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the OffshoreWindFarmPlanner software.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the OffshoreWindFarmPlanner software.
